Record.Value: Basic Fabrication
In this lesson, you'll learn how to fabricate new items and machines.
Stop Lathing Around
Welcome back, Cadet. Today, we will be using the {THING:StructureAutolathe} to turn your newly-made ingots into useful items and resources. Our first task is simple.
Turn on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Select the {THING:ItemCableCoil} using the arrow keys on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}, or click the yellow search button to find the {THING:ItemCableCoil}, and select it.
Pick up a {THING:ItemCopperIngot} from the orange crate.
To print the {THING:ItemCableCoil}, you will need to provide the {THING:StructureAutolathe} with the correct resources.
Place the {THING:ItemCopperIngot} into the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Press the large green button on the {THING:StructureAutolathe} to begin printing. Print four {THING:ItemCableCoil}.
Shiny New Sheets

Nice work, Cadet! The {THING:ItemCableCoil} will come in handy later. Now, we need to create some {THING:ItemIronSheets}. {THING:ItemIronSheets} are a key component in building most structures and machines.
As before, select the {THING:ItemIronSheets} from the menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemIronIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemIronIngot} into the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Print two {THING:ItemIronSheets}.
Plastic is Fake
The next component you will need is {THING:ItemPlasticSheets}. These are used to complete machines.
Select the {THING:ItemPlasticSheets} from the menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemSiliconIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemSiliconIngot} into the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Print two {THING:ItemPlasticSheets}.
The Bending Machine
The {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender} is used to create pipes, vents, and other atmospherics structures.
Select the {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender} from the menu on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemGoldIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemGoldIngot} into the left input slot on the {THING:StructureAutolathe}.
Print a {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender}.
The Pipebender
We can now build a {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}. Equip the newly-made {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender} and place it in the designated location.
Place the {THING:ItemKitHydraulicPipeBender}.
The Passive Vent

Using the printed components and what you have learned from the past tutorials, finish the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}, and power it up by connecting it to the power network using {THING:ItemCableCoil}. Then, print a {THING:ItemPassiveVent} using the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Complete the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Power up and turn on the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Pick up a {THING:ItemIronIngot} from the orange crate.
Place the {THING:ItemIronIngot} in to the left input slot on the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Select the {THING:ItemPassiveVent} from the {THING:StructureHydraulicPipeBender}.
Print a {THING:ItemPassiveVent}.
